message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I know you're interested in. I'm asking for $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price.  How about $9,250? This is a fair compromise that values both our needs.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to go up to $9,100 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget limitations.  To bridge the gap, I'm willing to lower my price to $9,150. This reflects a genuine effort to make this deal work for both of us.
Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I am pleased to offer $9,100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
